entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
